title: Shinagawa, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

Japane signature ULQ, in Japanese; title upper center in
description: row of buildings alongside waterfront; final members of daimyo procession dressed in dark blue carry red and green boxes over shoulders as they march away from the scene, down the road between the buildings; women in kimono stand in open doorways; male onlookers stand at LR, below a steep bluff with trees; moored boats in the water at L
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
